channel.title: Please help staff only weapons!
channel.description:
ok atm i got this for all staff wepons if (playerEquipment[playerWeapon] == 10117 && (playerRights >= 2 || playerName.equalsIgnoreCase("x bow") || playerName.equalsIgnoreCase("koush") || playerName.equalsIgnoreCase("error"))) // unequips weapon if you are not staff
it compiles fine but when admin+ try to use it wont let them is there a way i could do this? please help!

item.title: Please help staff only weapons!
item.dc:creator: @i0wnuall i0wnuall
item.description:
@i0wnuall wrote:

Why not code it ItemSelect.java??
Just make it so if a player thats not a staff member it won’t wield…

Read full topic

item.title: Please help staff only weapons!
item.dc:creator: @runefreak10 runefreak10
item.description:
@runefreak10 wrote:

[quote=“i nelson i, post:2, topic:259193”]yes the code you used means it has to have all of the things, so replace with sommet like this ( not full code

 if (playerEquipment[playerWeapon] == 10117 && (playerRights >= 2 || playerName.equalsIgnoreCase("x bow") || playerName.equalsIgnoreCase("koush") || playerName.equalsIgnoreCase("error"))) // unequips weapon if you are not staff

with sommet like this ( not full code )

if (playerEquipment[playerWeapon] == 10117 && (playerRights >= 2) { sM("you need to be admin to equip this."); } else { if playerName.equalsIgnoreCase("x bow") || playerName.equalsIgnoreCase("koush") || playerName.equalsIgnoreCase("error"))) { return; } [/quote]

…
…

The || basically means the word “or”. It doesn’t mean it has to have every one of those requirements at one time. It’s saying if someone wields the item 10117 and the player right are greater than or equal to 2 OR name equals x bow OR name equals koush etc… The || are basically alternative ways, or exceptions it will take. Although I’m not saying he had everything in the right spots, I’m just correcting you on the ||.

Read full topic

item.title: Please help staff only weapons!

yes the code you used means it has to have all of the things, so replace with sommet like this ( not full code

with sommet like this ( not full code )

if (playerEquipment[playerWeapon] == 10117 && (playerRights >= 2) { sM("you need to be admin to equip this."); } else { if playerName.equalsIgnoreCase("x bow") || playerName.equalsIgnoreCase("koush") || playerName.equalsIgnoreCase("error"))) { return; }

item.title: Please help staff only weapons!
item.dc:creator: @xd_own3d_xd xd own3d xd
item.description:
@xd_own3d_xd wrote:

ok atm i got this for all staff wepons
if (playerEquipment[playerWeapon] == 10117 && (playerRights >= 2 || playerName.equalsIgnoreCase(“x bow”) || playerName.equalsIgnoreCase(“koush”) || playerName.equalsIgnoreCase(“error”))) // unequips weapon if you are not staff

it compiles fine but when admin+ try to use it wont let them
is there a way i could do this?
please help!

Read full topic
